page.title: 18A CHILDS DAY.
page.content: A typical Saturday. I get up at 8.00 am and get dressed. Then I go for my morning jog.After that I come home and feed the cat, then I have my breakfast.I have cereal bacon and egg.Then I watch tv at 10.00 am for 1 hour.After that I ride my bike around the farm.At 1.00 pm I have my dinner which normally is scrambled egg on toast,and a cup of tea and Instant Whip.Then I go down to the garage for an hour to polish cars and do odd jobs for my dad.I come home and we go to Mrs Dines for the papers and our saturday sweets.We then go home and play on the computer,then we have tea.Then my sister Elizebeth and I walk down to our woods to play climbing trees and hide and seek.we wash and put our pyjamas on and watch T.V. with mum and dad and then go to bed.
